verses.verse: (To the director: With stringed instruments. A song of David.) God, hear my cry for help. Listen to my prayer.
From a faraway land I call to you for help. I feel so weak and helpless! Carry me to a high rock where no one can reach me.
You are my place of safety, a strong tower that protects me from my enemies.

I want to live in your tent (tent The place where God lives among his people. Here, it is the Temple in Jerusalem. See “Holy Tent” and “Temple” in the Word List.) forever. I want to hide where you can protect me. Selah
God, you heard what I promised to give you, but everything your worshipers have comes from you.
Give the king a long life. Let him live forever!
Let him rule in your presence forever. Protect him with your faithful love.
Then I will praise your name forever. Every day I will do what I promised.
